headline: Trump endorses J.D. Vance for Ohio senate seat
author: Adam Schrader
sentences: The news comes amid a race crowded with Republicans, including former state treasurer Josh Mandel and former Ohio Republican Party chair Jane Timken, who have spent more than a year vying for the coveted endorsement.
